data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Skoracki, Maciej, Hromada, Martin, Unsoeld, Markus (2013): Three new quill mite species of the genus Neoaulonastus Skoracki (Acari: Syringophilidae) parasitizing passerines in Tanzania. Zootaxa 3616 (4): 367-377, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3616.4.5
